definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Chicken</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4000</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,type=!minecraft:item,type=!minecraft:painting,type=!minecraft:item_frame,type=!minecraft:glow_item_frame] at @s run tp @s ~ ~ ~ facing entity @p[distance=..100]</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="entity_face_player" x="147" y="223"><field name="except"> </field><field name="types"> </field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="distance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></xml>
